description: This file implements the Netlink communication interface for interacting with Linux kernel networking features. It contains classes and methods for serializing, deserializing, and sending/receiving netlink messages, including management of message sequences and socket operations.

classes.name: Netlink
classes.description: Represents a netlink message with methods for serialization and deserialization, managing message sequence IDs.

classes.name: SocketNetlink
classes.description: Manages socket communication for netlink messages, handling sending, receiving, and queuing of messages.

methods.name: uint16_t Serialize(uint8_t stream[],const uint16_t length) const
methods.description: Serializes a netlink message into a byte stream for transmission.

methods.name: uint16_t Deserialize(const uint8_t stream[],const uint16_t streamLength)
methods.description: Deserializes incoming byte stream into netlink message components.

methods.name: uint32_t Send(const Core::Netlink & outbound,const uint32_t waitTime)
methods.description: Sends a netlink message through the socket interface, with optional wait.

methods.name: uint32_t Exchange(const Core::Netlink & outbound,Core::Netlink & inbound,const uint32_t waitTime)
methods.description: Performs a send and wait-for-response operation over netlink.

methods.name: uint16_t SendData(uint8_t * dataFrame,const uint16_t maxSendSize)
methods.description: Prepares data for sending over the socket, pulling from pending message queue.

methods.name: uint16_t ReceiveData(uint8_t * dataFrame,const uint16_t receivedSize)
methods.description: Processes incoming data from the socket, matching responses to pending requests.

methods.name: void StateChange()
methods.description: Placeholder method to signal socket state changes.

methods.name: void DumpFrame(const TCHAR prefix[],const uint8_t frame[],const uint16_t length)

ctags.name: Deserialize
ctags.pattern: /^    uint16_t Netlink::Deserialize(const uint8_t stream[], const uint16_t streamLength)$/

ctags.name: DumpFrame
ctags.pattern: /^    static void DumpFrame(const TCHAR prefix[], const uint8_t frame[], const uint16_t length)$/
ctags.signature: (const TCHAR prefix[],const uint8_t frame[],const uint16_t length)

ctags.name: Exchange
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t SocketNetlink::Exchange(const Core::Netlink& outbound, Core::Netlink& inbound, cons/

ctags.name: ReceiveData
ctags.pattern: /^    \/* virtual *\/ uint16_t SocketNetlink::ReceiveData(uint8_t* dataFrame, const uint16_t recei/

ctags.name: Send
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t SocketNetlink::Send(const Core::Netlink& outbound, const uint32_t waitTime)$/

ctags.name: SendData
ctags.pattern: /^    \/* virtual *\/ uint16_t SocketNetlink::SendData(uint8_t* dataFrame, const uint16_t maxSendS/

ctags.name: Serialize
ctags.pattern: /^    uint16_t Netlink::Serialize(uint8_t stream[], const uint16_t length) const$/
